abstract: George E. Pataki, a three-term Republican governor in a left-leaning state, said in a video released on his website: “My vision was not of partisan division. It was a vision about people.”

headline.main: George Pataki Joins Republican Hopefuls Wanting to Be President

snippet: George E. Pataki, a three-term Republican governor in a left-leaning state, said in a video released on his website: “My vision was not of partisan division. It was a vision about people.”
